channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 07:39 Flow to the Zaporizhzhia Oblast. Watch for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 07:39 Flow to the Zaporizhzhia Oblast. Watch for further messages.#Zaporizhzhia This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
